articles.author: Kevin Fairbanks
articles.description: Discover the true story behind 420, the iconic day celebrated by cannabis enthusiasts around the world. From its intriguing counterculture origins to its role in cannabis advocacy and legalization, explore how 420 became a global phenomenon. Learn about safe consumption, the impact of legalization, and how you can join the festivities!
articles.title: The Secret Origins of 420: Unraveling the Mysteries of Cannabis Culture’s Biggest Day
